meanings.definition: Speak in order to give information or express ideas or feelings.
meanings.sent1: She talks to her friends about her favorite books.
meanings.sent2: He talks to his teacher to ask questions about the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The parrot talks all day long, entertaining everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The river talks to the rocks as it flows swiftly downstream.
meanings.sent5: The old radio talks softly in the corner, sharing stories from the past.
meanings.sent6: After school, she talks with her classmates about their day.
meanings.sent7: The baby talks to her toys, pretending they can understand her.
meanings.sent8: The cat talks to the birds outside, hoping they will come closer.
meanings.sent9: During the meeting, he talks confidently about the new project.
meanings.sent10: The wind talks to the trees, rustling their leaves in a gentle conversation.

meanings.sent1: They talks about their favorite movies during lunch.
meanings.sent2: We talks with our neighbors about the upcoming block party.
meanings.sent3: The computer talks to the printer, deciding on the best way to print the document.
meanings.sent4: The sun talks to the moon each night, sharing stories of the day.
meanings.sent5: The siblings talks late into the night, catching up on each other's lives.

meanings.definition: Formal discussions or negotiations between opposing parties.
meanings.sent1: The talks between the two countries aimed to bring peace to the region.
meanings.sent2: The union and the company are in talks to reach a new agreement.
meanings.sent3: During the talks, both sides presented their arguments respectfully.
meanings.sent4: The talks between the coach and the player led to a better understanding.
meanings.sent5: The talks between the parents and the school resolved the issue amicably.
